Se embarazo a una corta edad, no se siente defraudada por eso, ya que tuvo la fuerza y coraje para crecer, trabajar y darle un rumbo a su vida. Sus hijos son el mayor tesoro que tiene. Por eso quiere surgir y triunfar para brindarle una buena calidad de vida. Aún son pequeños y ya se encuentra ahorrando. Por ello todas las mañanas sale a vender pasto a fuera de su casa, todos los pobladores de su comunidad, la conocen y saben lo trabajadora y luchadora que es, por ello no dudan en comprarle el alimento para sus animales. Ya por las tardes, sale a los terrenos agrícolas donde ella corta la alfalfa que venderá al día siguiente, según cuenta tiene que comprar parcelas enteras de sembrío. Los planes que tiene es aumentar la calidad de sus pastos y comercializarlos al por mayor, pues sabe que tiene que pensar en grande si quiere surgir en la vida. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación  porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Soledad de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más parcelas de alfalfa para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Soledad is a humble young woman of 22 who lives in Auquimarca community.  She lives with her family which consists of her husband and their two young children.  The couple care for the children in their own home.  Soledad fell pregnant at a young age but she doesn't feel disappointed at all as she had the strength and courage to grow, work and give her life direction.  Her children are the greatest treasure that she has.  For this reason, she wants to do well and be successful so that she can provide them with a good quality of life.  They are still young and she is already saving up.  

Every morning, Soledad goes out to sell fodder near her home.  All the people in her community know her and they know how hard-working and tenacious she is.  For this reason, they do not hesitate to buy feed from her for their animals.  In the afternoons, Soledad goes out to her farmland where she cuts the alfalfa that she will sell the following day.  She says that she has to buy entire plots of land sown with alfalfa.  Her plans are to increase the quality of her fodder and to sell it wholesale as she knows that she must think big if she wants to do well in life.

This is Soledad's second loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive your cooperation so that she can continue achieving her aims.  For her part, she pledges once again to make her repayments on time.  Soledad enjoys being a member of her community bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.  With your support, Soledad will invest the money she has requested in buying more plots of land sown with alfalfa to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy plots of land sown with alfalfa

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise (footwear, purses).

loans.name: Magret

texts.en:
Magret is a 27-year-old business woman who lives in Juba Nimule. She is widowed and has two children, ages 6 and 3 years. Both of them go to school.
 
Magret runs a small local brewery bar business. She has been in the business for three years. She has one employee. Magret heard about Finance Sudan from fellow clients, and through outreach and promotion done by the loan officers. She is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more items like honey, sugar, and yeast. In addition to this business, Magret has no other source of income. 

In five years time, Magret hopes for increments to her business because it is marketable in the area.

Her major challenges include home expenses and the expensiveness of honey because it is seasonal.
  
Magret says that she is happy for Finance South Sudan’s support, which leads to the growth of her business. She is requesting them to continue.

loans.use: to purchase more items like honey, sugar, and yeast.

loans.name: Dario

texts.es: En el caserío de Huari, vive Darío, un hombre fuerte de 36 años, que construyó su familia junto a Clemencia, su esposa desde hace 3 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos a los que cuidan en su casa propia. Desde joven aprendió a vivir del campo, los pastos amplios y la geografía del lugar le permite cuidar de sus animales con tranquilidad. El trabajo al que se dedica es la ganadería, cuenta con vacas, ovejas y llamas, tienen un número considerable de ellos. Pues los cuida con mucha dedicación y esmero. Además de recibir el apoyo de su esposa, quien elabora quesos pequeños o llamados bolillos; que vende a buen precio en el mismo lugar donde vive, al día elabora un promedio de 20 ejemplares. Ya tienen 17 años de experiencia, en todo este tiempo obtuvieron muchos clientes, los cuales visitan su granja para poder comercializarlos. Ahora su proyecto es mejorar la raza de sus animales para poder vender a más precio ya que son bien ofertados en el mercado. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “los huariñoz” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación  porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Darío de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más animales para engordarlos.
texts.en:
Darío lives in the small village of Huari.  He is a strong, 36-year-old man, who formed his family together with Clemencia, his wife of three years.  The couple have four children who they care for in their own home.  Darío learned to live in the countryside from a young age.  The ample pasture and the geography of the place allow him to peacefully care for his animals.  Darío's business is raising livestock.  He has a large number of cows, sheep and llamas.  He cares for his animals with a lot of dedication and commitment.  He has the support of his wife, who makes small cheeses called 'bolillos' and sells them from home for a good price.  She makes an average of 20 a day.  The couple have 17 years experience and, over this time, they have gained a lot of customers who visit their farm to buy their products.  Darío's current project is to improve the breed of his animals so that he can sell them for more money.

Darío belongs to "Los Huariñoz” community bank and this is his third loan from MFP.  He hopes to receive your cooperation so that he can continue achieving his goals.  For his part, he pledges once more to make his repayments on time.  Darío enjoys being a member of his community bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.  With your support, he will invest the money that he has requested in buying more animals to fatten.

loans.use: to buy more animals

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 35 years old, married, and has one child.

Ali has been an owner of a bakery since 2004, selling bread and pastries. He has sufficient experience in this field and a good reputation. His bakery is situated in a crowded area so there are a lot of customers passing by.

He decided to apply for a $2,400 loan in order to renovate his bakery and to buy an electric mixer. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to renovate his bakery and to buy an electric mixer.

loans.name: Salah

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 42 years old, married, and has four children.

Salah has owned a small shop for photocopying since 1992. He has more than twenty years experience in this field and has a good reputation. He is well-known in the surrounding areas.

He decided to apply for a $2,400 loan in order to purchase a photocopier machine. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to purchase a photocopier machine.

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Дилафруз умная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем, мать пятерых несовершеннолетних детей. Более двух лет она занимается купле- продажей детской и взрослой одежды. У неё много постоянных клиентов. Муж работает таксистом. Дилафруз хотела бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки сезонной одежды.
texts.en: Dilafruz is a smart and hardworking woman. She is married and is a mother of five underage children. She has been reselling children's and other clothing for more than two years. She has many regular customers. Her husband works as a taxi driver. Dilafruz wants to get a loan in the amount of 5,000 somoni to buy seasonal clothing.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Raydee

texts.es: En el caserío de Huari vive Raydee, una mujer sencilla de 38 años. Que conformó su familia con Darío, su esposo desde hace 22 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos, de los cuales 3 estudian en la capital del país y los demás ya conformaron su familia.  Junto a su esposo se ingenian para poder mandar la mensualidad a sus hijos que estudian en la capital. La ganadería es su principal sustento, durante semanas y días se internan a la zona alta de su comunidad, llamadas estancias, donde existen pastos verdes y amplias praderas que le sirven para el cuidado de sus animales. Cuentan con 50 ovejas, 12 vacas de buena raza y 28 llamas. Una vez a la semana bajan a la ciudad a comercializarlos a sus clientes, que le pagan una suma considerable de dinero por ellos. Además aprovecha para realizar queso fresco y rico que vende a las diferentes tiendas que existe en su pueblo. Pero como los gastos se incrementaron con el estudio de sus hijos, brindan servicio de pastoreo a otros ganaderos que no pueden cuidar de sus animales en las estancias, los que le pagan un sueldo mensual por ello. De esa manera pueden obtener más ingresos y así cumplir el sueño de sus hijos. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los huariñoz” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación  porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Raydee de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de animales reproductores de raza para aumentar su ganado.
texts.en:
In the hamlet of Huari lives Raydee, a simple woman of 38 years who made a family with Darío, her husband of 22 years. Together they have six children of whom three study in the country's capital and the rest have already started their own families. Together with her husband she figures out how they may send the monthly stipend to their children who study in the capital. Livestock farming is her primary sustenance. For days and weeks they retreat to the heights of their community, called stays, where there are green pastures and wide prairies where they may care for their animals. They have 50 sheep, 12 cows of a good breed, and 28 llamas. They also make use of the milk to produce rich, fresh cheeses which they sell at various shops in their pueblo. But since expenses have risen with the studies of their children, they offer shepherding services to other livestock farmers who are not able to take care of their animals in the stays, who pay them a monthly salary to do it. In this way they are able to earn more income and fulfill the dream of their children. 

She belongs to the communal bank "Los Huariñoz" and this is her third loan with MFP where she hopes for your collaboration in order to continue meeting her goals. She promises as well to make her payments once again. Additionally she appreciates being part of her association because all the members are responsible and mutually supportive people. Once she receives her loan Raydee will invest the requested money in the purchase of purebred animals for breeding in order to increase her herd.

loans.use: to purchase more cows.

loans.name: Geminis Group

texts.es:
Geminis es un grupo solidario del municipio de Hidalgo, pequeño pueblo al norte de Nuevo Leon. Ellas son 7 mujeres trabajadoras que acaban de recibir su segundo crédito. Priscilla es la lider y presidenta del grupo. Ella está casada y tiene un niño de 5 años llamado Jhonary que está estudiando en el jardín de niños. 

Hace 1 año, su esposo comenzó a tener problemas financieros y sus ingresos no eran suficientes para sostener los gastos de la familia. Fue ahí cuando Priscila se decidió que aparte de ser ama de casa, debía de comenzar algún negocio que le permitiera apoyar a su marido con los gastos del hogar. 

Prisicilla decidió comenzar a vender joyería de plata pues además de ser un negocio muy redituable que le da la oportunidad de obtener ingresos adicionales, este trabajo le permitía trabajar desde su casa y no descuidar su hogar ni a su familia, la cual para ella es la principal motivación para salir adelante en el negocio. Priscilla surte una vez por mes y las ganancias que saca de sus ventas son del doble de lo que gasta. 

Con este crédito ella espera comprar más mercancía para surtir y así poder vender más productos a más clientes. Ella espera seguir vendiendo cada día más y poder algun día tener bajo su mando a más gente que le ayuden a vender y así conversirse poco a poco en una de las mayores proveedoras en el área.
texts.en:
"Geminis" is a communal bank from the municipallity of Hidalgo, a small pueblo to the north of Nuevo Leon. They are seven hardworking women who have just received their second loan. Priscilla is the leader and president of the group. She is married and has a five-year-old son named Jhonary who attends kindergarten. 

One year ago her husband began having financial difficulties and his income was not sufficient to cover family expenses. At that time Priscilla made the decision that, in addition to managing the household, she should start up some new business which would allow her to support her husband with the household costs. 

Priscilla decided to begin selling silver jewelry, a very profitable business which allows her the opportunity to gain extra income. Additionally this work would allow her to work from home and not neglect her home nor her family which is her primary motivation for getting ahead in the business. Priscilla stocks up once a month and the earnings she receives from her sales are double what she spends. 

With this loan she hopes to purchase more merchandise for stocking up and thus be able to sell more products to more customers. She hopes to continue to sell more and more each day and someday, to have others under her supervision who help her to make the sales. Thus she hopes little by little to become one of the major providers in the area.

loans.use: to stock more silver jewelry.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is from Iraq.  He is 30 years old, married and has one child.
 
Since 2000, Hasan has owned a workshop where he paints and fixes cars.  He has more than 10 years of experience in this field.  He is well known in his neighborhood and has a good reputation.
 
Hasan is requesting a loan in the amount of $3,000 from ACSI in order to pay the annual rent on his shop and to add more items to his inventory.  He wants to increase his profit in order to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent on his shop and to add items to his inventory.

loans.name: Yaya

texts.fr:
Monsieur Yaya est un célibataire de 24 ans, qui vit dans une famille traditionnelle dans la ville de Sikasso ( troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Monsieur Yaya après avoir mené beaucoup d’activités sans succès,  s’est initié à la fabrique de savons traditionnels (savons noirs) il y a environ six ans qu’il a appris auprès de sa mère. Il mène son activité dans son domicile où il est beaucoup sollicité de sa clientèle pour la qualité de ses produits. 
Pour satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, il décide de rejoindre l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso depuis plus de 6 mois. Il  est à son premier prêt individuel qu’il compte utiliser pour acheter, 5 futs des déchets d’huile de coton, 5 sacs de soude caustique et 2 chargements de charrette en bois de chauffe. Après fabrication des savons à base de déchets d’huile de coton et de soude caustique, elle les revend en détail à une clientèle composée généralement de femmes de sa localité.
Il envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 140 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé essentiellement pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, contribuer aux dépenses familiales et payer les intérêts de son prêt.
texts.en:
Yaya is a 24-year-old single man who lives in a traditional family in the city of Sikasso (third administrative region of the Republic of Mali.
After many unsuccessful business venture, Yaya began making traditional soaps (black soaps), which he learned from his mother and has been doing for about six years. He conducts business at home where he has many customers who appreciate the quality of his products.
In order to meet the needs of his ever increasing customer base, he decided to join the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso about six months ago. He is on his first individual loan which he plans on using to buy 5 barrels of leftover cottonseed oil, 5 sacks of sodium hydroxide, and two carts of firewood. After making soaps out of cottonseed oil and sodium hydroxide, he sells them retail to a customer base mainly comprised of women from his area.
With this loan he hopes to make a monthly profit of 140,000 FCFA which will be used to increase the size of his business, pay his family's expenses, and pay the interest on the loan.

loans.use: to buy leftover cottonseed oil and sodium hydroxide.

loans.name: Amable

texts.es:
Amable tiene 75 años de edad y vive en una comunidad llamada desamparados, en la provincia de San Jose, capital de Costa Rica. En esta zona cuenta con una amplia gama de hoteles y le ofrece al turista museos, restaurantes, parques, volcanes centros de conferencias, modernos centros comerciales, cines, teatros, galerías y mucha y variada diversión nocturna. Dentro de las principales atracciones culturales se encuentra el Teatro Nacional, situado en la Plaza de la Cultura e inaugurado en 1897, el Museo del Oro, el Museo de Arte y Diseño Contemporáneo y el Museo de los Niños. Algunas de las más famosas fiestas y celebraciones de la provincia de San José son las fiestas populares de fin y principio de cada año, el Festival de La Luz, en el mes de diciembre y la exposición nacional de orquídeas, en el mes de marzo.

Amable desde hace unos meses tiene el deseo de hacer unos cambios en su hogar. Ya que se le dificulta, porque no tiene suficientes ingresos económicos y quiere brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Es por esto que Amable está solicitando el monto de 300,000.00 (trescientos mil colones), para la compra de materiales de construcción para poder arreglar el piso de su casa, cambiarlo por cerámica para darle un mejor aspecto, disminuir y mejorar su trabajo en el hogar.

Amable es miembro de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Rincón Grande S.A, este será su sexto  préstamo razón por la cual está  muy agradecida por las oportunidades  de acceso al crédito que esta le brinda y poder llevar a cabo sus proyectos de vida.
texts.en:
Amable is 75 years old and lives in a community named Desamparados in the province of San Jose, capital of Costa Rica. This area has a wide range of hotels and offers tourists museums, restaurants, parks, volcanoes, conference centers, modern shopping centers, cinemas, theaters, galleries and a varied nightlife. Among the cultural attractions is the National Theatre, located in the Plaza de la Cultura and opened in 1897, the Gold Museum, the Museum of Contemporary Art and Design and the Museum of Children. Some of the most famous festivals and celebrations in the province of San José are the festivities at the beginning and end of each year, such as the Festival of Light in December and the national orchid exhibition in March.

For a few months now, Amable has wanted to make some changes in her home. She has been struggling to do this, because she does not earn a sufficient income and wants to provide a better quality of life for her family.

This is why Amable is seeking a loan in the amount of 300,000.00 (three hundred thousand colones) to purchase building materials to repair the floor of her house, replace it with ceramic tiles to give it a better appearance, and reduce and improve the work at home.

Amable is a member of the communal bank 'Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Rincón Grande S.A', and this will be her sixth loan. She is grateful for the opportunities she has been given to access credit, which help her achieve her life plans.

loans.use: purchase ceramic tiles for her home

loans.name: Moein

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq.  He is 26 years old, single and lives with four family members.

Moein owns a farm where he raises calves and sells a variety of dairy products.  He has been in business since 2005 and, because he lives in a rural area, he has gained experience over time.  He is well known in his area and has a good reputation.

He is requesting a loan in the amount of $1,800 to build a roof for the farm.  He aspires to buy more cows and to increase milk production so that he will be able to improve his family’s quality life.

loans.use: to build a roof for the farm.

loans.name: Abdoul Karim

texts.fr:
Né Vers 1970 à Sikasso, Monsieur Abdoul Karim est marié et père de cinq enfants. Il réside avec sa famille dans une grande famille traditionnelle élargie à Kaboïla II, un des quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso.
Monsieur Abdoul Karim est un frigoriste qui mène des activités de réparation et de vente des réfrigérateurs et accessoires il y a environ vingt ans. Il connaît le domaine en détail mais les moyens lui font défaut pour pouvoir satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cesse d’augmenter.
 Il décide alors de rejoindre l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec qui il est à son premier prêt individuel.
Ce premier crédit qui lui permettra d’acheter, 3 gaz de recharges, 3 réfrigérateurs occasions, 5 deshydrateurs et 20 baguettes.
 Il s’approvisionne à Bamako avant de revendre ou de rendre ses services dans son atelier ou dans les domiciles.
Il envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 150 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé essentiellement pour contribuer aux dépenses familiales, payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Born around 1970 in Sikasso, Abdoul Karim is married and the father of five children. He lives with his family in a large traditional extended family in Kaboila II, one of the working class neighborhoods in the city of Sikasso. 
He repairs and sells refrigerators and their accessories and has been doing so for approximately 20 years. He is an expert in this field, but he is unable to meet the needs of his ever increasing customer base.
This is why he decided to join the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso, who he is on his first individual loan with.
This first loan enables him to buy 3 gas refills, 5 driers, and 20 rods.
He buys his supplies in Bamako before selling them or offering his services either out of his workshop or by making house calls.
With this loan, he hopes to make a monthly profit of 150,000 FCFA which will be used to cover his family's expenses and pay the interest on the loan, and the rest will be invested back into his business.

loans.use: to buy various items.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.fr:
Madame Aminata est âgée de 31 ans, elle est mariée et mère de trois enfants. Elle réside avec son époux et leurs enfants dans une grande famille traditionnelle à Sanoubougou I, un des quartiers périphériques de la ville de Sikasso.
Madame Aminata est une couturière qui achète des tissus, bazins, rideaux et de napperon afin de les modifier pour pouvoir les revendre à sa clientèle. Elle dans ce créneau il y a plus de quinze ans et mène son activité à domicile. 
Pour satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, elle décide de rejoindre l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec qui elle est à son premier prêt individuel. 
Elle compte acheter avec ce premier prêt, 2 pièces de tissus, 2 pièces de bazin riche, 2 colis de napperon et 3 balles de rideaux. Elle s’approvisionne à Bamako auprès des grossistes.  Madame Aminata vend ses marchandises au comptant et à crédit à une clientèle composée de femmes.
 Elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 90 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé essentiellement pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, contribuer aux dépenses familiales et payer les intérêts de son prêt.
texts.en:
Aminata is 31 years old, married, and has three children. She lives with her husband and their children in a large traditional family in Sanoubougou I, one of the neighborhoods on the outskirts of Sikasso.
Aminata is a seamstress and buys fabrics, bazin (a certain type of cloth), curtains, and mats to transform them and sell them to her customers. She has been doing this out of her home for over 15 years.
To meet the needs of her ever increasing customer base, she decided to join the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso, with whom she is on her first individual loan.
With this loan she plans on buying two lengths of fabric, two lengths of fine bazin, two packages of mats, and three bales of curtains. She buys her supplies in Bamako from wholesalers. She sells her products for cash and credit to a customer base made up of women.
She plans on making a monthly profit of 90,000 FCFA which will be used to increase the size of her business, take care of her family's expenses, and pay the interest on the loan.

loans.use: to buy outfits.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles  is a twenty-nine-years-old man from Kisumu City, West of Kenya and is married to Rebecca.  They have two children aged four and seven years.

Charles operates a motorcycle transport business locally known as bodaboda. He has worked in this business for the last nine years making a monthly income of KES. 30,000. He has applied for a second loan from KADET LTD which he will use to buy a new motorbike. 

He will use his profits to repay the loan. His dream is to own a taxi and at the same time buy land and build a family house.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Almoudou

texts.fr:
Âgé de plus 45 ans, Monsieur Almoudou est marié et père de 4 enfants, il réside avec sa famille à Médine, un des quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso.
N’ayant pas eu la chance d’avancer à l’école, il s’est très vite initié depuis plus de trente années à la couture auprès de son oncle à Sikasso. Son atélier se situe au grand marché de Sikasso et la plupart de sa clientèle est composée d’hommes surtout les forains. Avec une telle expérience dans le domaine, il jouit d’une parfaite confiance de la famille des tailleurs ce qui lui a valu la présidence du Comité de Surveillance de l’Association des Tailleurs de Sikasso (A.T.S.). En plus de la couture, il achète des machines à coudre à Lomé (république de Togo) et des tissus pour homme afin de les revendre aux tailleurs de Sikasso. 
Dans le souci de mieux satisfaire les commandes de plus en plus croissantes, il sollicite  ce cinquième prêt, auprès de l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle il est en partenariat il y environ trois années. 
Ce cinquième crédit lui permettra d’acheter, 10 machines à coudre et accessoires et 10 complets tissus.
Avec ce prêt, il envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 330 000 FCFA. Avec ces bénéfices réalisés, il compte résoudre l’essentielle de ses dépenses personnelles, contribuer aux dépenses familiales, payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son atelier.
texts.en:
Mr. Almoudou is over 45 years old, married and a father to 4 children. He lives with his family in Medina, a working-class district of the city of Sikasso.
Unable to stay in school, he started to learn sewing over 30 years ago with his uncle in Sikasso. He has a sewing shop at the big market of Sikasso, and his clientele consists primarily of men, most of them fair-goers. His extensive experience earned him the complete trust of the other members of his profession, which has led to his becoming the president of the Supervisory Committee of the Guild of Tailors of Sikasso (Comité de Surveillance de l’Association des Tailleurs de Sikasso). Besides tailoring, he buys sewing machines in Lomé (Republic of Togo) and men’s fabrics for resale to Sikasso tailors. 

In order to meet the growing demands of his customers, he is seeking a fifth loan from the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso, which he joined about 3 years ago. This fifth loan will allow him to buy 10 sewing machines and accessories and 10 suiting fabrics.

With this loan, he expects to earn a monthly profit of 330,000 FCFA, which he will use to cover the better part of his personal expenses, to help pay for the household expenses, and pay the loan interest. Any remainder will be invested in his sewing shop.

loans.use: to buy sewing machines and fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Nasent

texts.en:
Nasent is a 22-year-old single woman with no child. She's had a business of selling food in a stall in Yambio South Sudan for one year.

Nasent is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and cassava flour. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase beans and cassava flour for sale.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a hardworking Kenyan entrepreneur aged forty-one years of age and hails from Kisumu City. John has two children aged 11 and 16 years.

For eight years now, John has been operating a mobile phone accessories shop making a monthly income of KES. 15,000. He is a long time client of KADET LTD since he is in his seventh cycle. He has taken loans to buy more mobile accessories and also support his other businesses of a barbershop and welding workshop. He will use his profits to repay back his loan and also venture into other businesses.

His dream is to grow his business and also provide for his family’s basic needs.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone accesories.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es: En el caserío de Huari, vive Fredy, un hombre alegre de 31 años, que conformó su familia con Isabel, su esposa desde hace 8 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Marlon y Brany a los que cuidan en su casa propia. Hace algunos años, no tenía el conocimiento para aumentar su producción, ahora posee todo la experiencia como la dosificación de los animales, la comida balanceada y los pastos naturales; que según cuenta, tienen que comer para su buena alimentación y crecimiento. Por ello en la actualidad posee 60 ovejas. 8 vacas de buena raza y 100 llamas. Ser ganadero le gusta mucho, confiesa que cada vez que puede pide orientación a los técnicos e ingenieros que compran sus animales para sus proyectos. Ahora puede escoger al mejor postor, pues no solo ellos compran sus ganados, también lleva a la feria ganadera de la ciudad, donde no se abastece, teniendo que comprar más animales a los ganaderos de su comunidad. Por su parte su esposa vende leche y elabora queso, que comercializa en la misma comunidad a los visitantes que llegan. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “Los huariñoz” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación  porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Fredy de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más animales para engordarlos.
texts.en:
Fredy, 31,  lives in the village of Huari.  He is a cheerful man who has had a family with his wife, Isabel, for 8 years.  They have 2 children, Marlon and Brany and all live in their own house.  Some years ago he didn’t know how to increase his production but now he has lots of experience in how to give the right dosage to his animals, feed them balanced meals and natural grasses, that as he says, they need to eat for good nutrition and growth.  He now has 60 sheep, 8 cows of a good breed and 100 llamas.  He likes to be a livestock farmer very much and he confesses that each time he can, he asks for assistance from the technicians and engineers who buy his animals for their projects.  Now he can choose the best bid because they not only buy his animals, but he also takes them to livestock markets in the city where he can supply his stock by not having to buy more animals from the animal dealers in his community.  His wife also sells milk and makes cheese that she sells in the same community to the visitors who come.
He belongs to the united group “Los Huariñoz” and this is his fourth loan with MFP.  He hopes for your help in continuing with his goals.  He promises again to make all the payments in the established period.  He also is grateful to be a part of the association because all of the members are responsible and supportive people.  Fredy will use the requested money when he receives your help to buy more animals to fatten up-.

loans.use: to buy more animals

loans.name: Jenipher

texts.en:
Jenipher is a thirty-four-years-old lady  from the Nyalenda area of Kisumu town  and is married to David. They have five children aged 2-14 years.

Jenipher operates a food stall selling snacks such as buns (locally known as chapati and mandazi), a business she has done for the last 11 years making a monthly income of Kes 15,000. She is taking her 5th loan from KADET LTD which she will use to buy baking flour and cooking oil. Her profits will be used to educate and feed her children.

Her dream is to own a hotel.

loans.use: to buy foodstuff.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is from Iraq. He is 33 years old, married, and has three children, one of whom works. 

Ibrahim is an owner of a café, which he has owned since 2005. He offers different types of hot and cold drinks. He has a sufficient experience in this field and a good reputation. His café is situated in a crowded area so there are a lot of customers passing by.

Ibrahim is requesting a loan for $3000, which he will use to buy new tools and more goods. He is aiming to earn additional profits, which he will use to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase new tools and more goods.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: En la localidad de Palian, vive Sonia. Una mujer  de 20 años, comprometida con su familia en especial con su mamá Felicitas y su Hermana Carmen, con quienes vive en su casa propia. Sus padres poseen una casa en la comunidad de Huari, donde ella viaja una vez a la semana para comercializar las ropas de niños, mujeres y varones que lleva y deja a crédito a los pobladores del lugar. Le va muy bien en su trabajo, ya que es la única que vende prendas de vestir, la lejanía del pueblo y la actividad económica de las personas, que en su mayoría son ganaderos, le ayuda a tener mucho éxito. Pero hace poco comenzó a trabajar en una empresa reconocida del país, donde trabaja por horas y 4 veces a la semana. Ahí recibe todos los beneficios sociales aparte de un sueldo mensual, que le permite ayudar a sus padres y ahorrar mucho. Ya que está planeando estudiar una carrera superior el próximo año y de esa manera ser un ejemplo para su hermana. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los huariñoz” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación  porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Sonia, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de ropa de todo tamaño y variedad para cumplir con el pedido de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sonia lives in the locality of Palian. A 20-year-old woman, she is committed to her family, especially her mother Felicitas and her sister Carmen, with whom she lives in her own house. Her parents possess a house in the community of Huari and she travels there once a week to sell clothing for children, women and men. She delivers items on credit to the local population.

Sonia enjoys her work very much since she alone sells garments there. The remoteness of the town and the local people's economic activities – they are in the majority cattlemen – offer her much success. And recently, she began working in an enterprise well recognized in the country. She works by the hour during 4 days a week. There she receives all the social benefits plus a monthly salary, which permits her to help her parents and save much of her earnings. She now plans to study for a career at the university starting next year, and in this way, to become an example for her sister.

Sonia belongs to the solidarity group “los Huarinoz”. This is her 1st loan through MFP and she hopes for your collaboration to continue towards her objectives.  Consequently, Sonia promises to comply once again with her schedule of payments. In addition, she enjoys being a part of her association because all the members are responsible people with a sense of solidarity. 

Upon receiving your help, Sonia will purchase clothing of all sizes and varieties to fill her customers' orders.

loans.use: purchase more articles of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Yarines

texts.es: Yaniris de 34  años  vive en Soledad y se dedica a la venta de bebidas frías, desde hace 5 años cuando compró dos canastas de cerveza que le regalaron y una cava de icopor que llenaba con hielo los fines de semanas y festivos y vendía cervezas y gaseosas o sodas, a sus vecinos; poco a poco adquirió cajas en mayor cantidad y de contado y su negocio creció; hoy tiene 27 cajas y vende 70  , porque las otras se las prestan en el punto frio donde las compra. Su meta  es arrendar un local bien ubicado donde pueda montar un estanco, pero su más grande desafío es la falta de capital de trabajo para lograr su sueño. En la actualidad está planeando comprar un enfriador de 500 botellas para aumentar su capacidad de venta, esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, aprovechando que en la temporada  de carnavales las ventas de cervezas se incrementan en cualquier punto de la ciudad y de sus municipios donde se celebren los carnavales,una de las mejors fiestas culturales y folcloricas del país.
texts.en:
34-year-old Yarines lives in Soledad, Colombia and has a business selling cold drinks. She started this 5 years ago when she bought two crates of beer and a styrofoam container filled with ice. She would spend weekends and holidays selling beer, soft drinks and sodas to her neighbors. She gradually bought and sold larger quantities in cash, and her business grew. Today Yarines owns 27 crates but sells 70, because she borrows the others from the place where she buys the cold drinks. 

Yarines' goal is to rent a well located premises where she can assemble a store, but her biggest challenge is the lack of working capital to achieve her dream. She is currently planning to buy a refrigerator for 500 bottles to increase her sales capacity, and this is the reason that she is seeking the loan. 

This is her first loan with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. Yarines wants to take advantage of the carnival season which increases beer sales all over the city and throughout it's municipalities where the carnivals are held. This is one of the main cultural and folkloric festivals in the country.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for 500 bottles to increase her sales capacity

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es: En la plaza de Pancan, vive Ysabel, una mujer alegre de 46 años que conformó su familia con Orlando, su esposo desde hace 16 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos a los que cuida en su casa propia. Durante el día realiza diversas actividades, en las mañanas se dedica al lavado y planchado de fustanes típicos en una tienda reconocida de su ciudad, ahí obtiene un ingreso mensual. Ya por las tardes y después de alimentar a sus animales menores, entre cuyes, gallinas, cerdos y patos. Se dirige a cosechar papa o cualquier alimento que los agricultores siembran y que se encuentran maduros y listos pare ser extraídos de la tierra. Su esposo al igual que ella también trabaja como operario o peón, en diversos sembríos. Pero su principal actividad económica es la crianza de cuyes, los cuales cuida con mucha dedicación y esmero. Su secreto es alimentarlos con un pasto elaborado y concentrado con vitaminas de primera calidad, que ella misma elabora. Esto le permite tener animales saludables y con una alta carga de vitaminas y proteínas. Ahora y por las fiestas se quedo sin ejemplares, pues los vendió casi todos, por ello su proyecto es aumentar la cantidad de los cuyes. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “caminando hacia el futuro” y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación  porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Ysabel de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más cuyes y gallinas para aumentar su ganando.
texts.en: In the plaza of Pancan lives Ysabel, a happy woman of 46 years that formed her family with Orlando, her husband of 16 years.  The two have 4 children that they care for in their own house.  During the day she performs diverse activities.  In the morning she is dedicated to washing and ironing typical petticoats in a well known store of her city.  There she obtains a monthly income.  In the afternoons, after feeding her smaller animals, among them guinea pigs, chickens, hogs and ducks, she harvests potatoes or any food that the farmers sow that are mature and ready to be taken from the land.  Her husband also works as a operative or laborer in diverse sown fields, just like her.  But her main economic activity is the breeding of guinea pigs, which she takes care of with a lot of dedication and personal concern.  Her secret is to feed them with elaborate grasses concentrated with first quality vitamins that she herself devises.  This permits her to have healthy animals with a high amount of vitamins and proteins.  Now at the festivals they remain without compare, therefore she sells almost all of them.  Because of this, her project is to enlarge the quantity of guinea pigs.  She belongs to the supportive group called  "walking toward the future" and this is her fifth loan with MFP.  With its contribution, she hopes to continue with her objectives.  She also promises once more to comply with the payment schedule.   It pleases her to be part of her association because all their members are supportive and responsible people.  On receiving  this support, Ysabel will invest the requested money in the purchase of more guinea pigs and chickens to enlarge her profits.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens

loans.name: La Hermosa Group

texts.es:
La señora Ingar Domenica es casada, tiene 32 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 4 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la producción de pantalones y blusas, inició este negocio con una pequeña maquina de costura, y hasta ahora  lleva 15 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que  los utilizara para la compra de telas de diferentes clase ya que quiere incrementar su producción de pantalones y blusas, espera en el futuro tener una maquila. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedica a servicios de trasporte, albañilería, confección de delantales, blusas y faldas.
texts.en:
Señora Ingar Domenica is married.  She is 32 years of age and finished 6 years of primary education.  She has 4 children who are students.  She is dedicated to the production of pants and blouses.  She began this business with a small sewing machine and now has 15 years of experience.  She relies on the support of her husband who is dedicated to clothing sales. 

She organized a group to be able to request a loan, which will be used to buy cloth of different types, since she wants to increase her production of pants and blouses.  She hopes in the future to have a shop.  The other members of the group are dedicated to services such as transportation, bricklaying, and making aprons, blouses and skirts.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for sewing.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is 28 years old, married and the mother of three children. For the last year, she has earned a living by operating a cafe in Malindi, earning a monthly profit of KES 7,000 from her business.

Introduced to KADET LTD by one of our credit officers, Christime is applying for her first loan for KES 20,000 to buy items and food stock needed for her business. She will use the profits made possible by this loan to pay for her children's school fees, and her goal for the future is to continue growing her business so that she can give her family a good and stable life.

loans.use: to buy items and food supplies needed for her business.

loans.name: Folbe

texts.en: Folbe, a 33-year-old married woman with five children, all of who are in school, has operated a business selling food from a stall in Yambio, South Sudan for three years. Now requesting a loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and rice, she will use her extra income from this loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase beans and rice for resale.

loans.name: Buah Naga 2 Group

texts.en:
Maryati is 39 years old and married with two children. One of the children has found a job and the other one is still attending school. She has been selling fried food and soft drinks for one year. The business is going well and the income can help her to provide her family's daily needs. 

Maryati is taking her first loan with VisionFund Indonesia to add more varieties of food and to pay for raw materials such as flour, bananas and sugar to make more fried snacks, so that she can increase her customers. In the future, she wants to have her own kiosk and have enough savings to send her child to a better education. The other group members will use their loans to improve their businesses such as selling cookies and selling cell phone minutes refills.

loans.use: to pay for flour, bananas and sugar to make more fried bananas to sell.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria, a 36-year-old married mother of three children between 5 and 25 years old, all in school and living at home, lives in Airport, Liberia where for the past 13 years she has been selling dried fish in the market. She started this business with money given to her by her husband, having learned the livelihood from her mother. Her biggest challenge is the rainy season.

Victoria is now requesting a loan to purchase more dried fish for her business, and she hopes to build a house in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more dried cassava fish for her business.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
En el anexo de Pancan, vive Gregoria, una mujer de 42 años que conformó su familia con Hernán, su esposo desde hace 3 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos de los cuales solo cuidan a 2 de ellos que son menores, en casa de su suegra.  Trabaja sin descanso para el sustento económico de su familia. En temporadas festivas, que se realiza en los meses de enero y febrero, en la ciudad de Jauja, aprovecha esos meses para trabajar en una tienda de disfraces, en donde se encarga del lavado de los mismos, para que puedan ser alquilados nuevamente. Ahí obtiene un ingreso extra, pero como es una mujer con iniciativa; durante el año trabaja en el negocio de compra y venta de animales, pan típico o denominado “pan de Jauja” y queso, a la capital del país, donde obtiene bastante dinero. Pero como buena mujer del campo siembra también maíz en la parcela que tiene y en temporada de cosecha lo comercializa al mercado mayorista de su localidad en donde también vende los cuyes y gallinas que cría con mucho esfuerzo, pues no se abastece de las múltiples actividades que realiza. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “caminando hacia el futuro” y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación  porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Gregoria de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más animales para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en: In the annex of Pancan, lives Gregoria, a woman of 42 years that formed her family with Hernán, her husband of 3 years.  The two have 6 children, the 2 smallest of which they care for at the home of their mother-in-law.  She works without rest for the economic living of her family.  In festive seasons, that occur in the months of January and February in the city of Jauja, she takes advantage of those months to work in a costume store, where she takes charge of washing the costumes so that they can be rented again.  There she obtains extra income, as she is a woman with initiative.  During the year she works in the business of buying and selling animals, traditional bread (also called "bread of Juaja") and cheese, in the capital of the country, where she obtains enough money.  But as a good woman of the field she also sows corn in the plot that she has and in harvest season she markets it to the wholesale market of her locality where she also sells guinea pigs and chickens that she raises with a lot of effort.  Yet this does not supply her needs, even with the multiple activities that she carries out.  She belongs to the supportive group called  "walking toward the future" and this is her fifth loan with MFP.  With its contribution, she hopes to continue with her objectives.  She also promises to comply with the payment schedule.   It pleases her to be part of their association because all their members are supportive and responsible people.  With this support Gregoria will invest the requested money in the purchase of more animals to supply her business.

loans.use: to buy more animals.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for cookware such a frying pan and pot

loans.name: Buah Naga 3 Group

texts.en: Renny is 38 years old. She is married to an employee. They are blessed with two children, ages 11 and 8 years old, who still attending school. For the past two years, she has been working hard selling cookies in front of her house and door to door around the neighborhood. Her business is going well but she needs more money to buy supplies such as flour, chocolate, sugar and butter to make more cookies to sell. From this business, she is able to pay her children's school fees and help her husband to meet the needs of the family. In the future, she wants to expand her business and buy a new display window. The other group members will use their loan to improve their businesses such as selling chicken porridge, selling cookies and selling clothes.

loans.use: to buy flour, chocolate, sugar and butter to make more cookies to sell

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret is applying for her second loan of 70,000 KES to purchase a stock of clothes such as skirts, trousers and shirts for resale. She will save the anticipated profit and help take care of her children. In the future, Margaret hopes to grow her business so as to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy an additional stock of used clothes for resale.

loans.name: Mencia

texts.es: En el caserío de Pancan vive Mencia, una mujer seria de 34 años que conformó su familia con Samuel, su esposo desde hace 25 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos menores a los que cuidan en su casa propia. Sus hijos aún son pequeños por eso desea, consolidar su negocio y de esa manera poder dedicar más tiempo y brindarles una buena educación. Junto a su esposo se dividen las actividades que realizaran durante el día. Ella cuida de sus sembríos de papa y maíz, en donde todas las mañanas surca los pastos y fertiliza para que den buen fruto. A pesar de las horas de frío y hambre que pasa no se siente decaída, pues sabe que todo esfuerzo siempre tiene una recompensa. Es así que en cada cosecha ven su esfuerzo concretado en la venta de los alimentos a la ciudad. Pero hace algunos meses, comenzó en el negocio de compra y venta de animales en especial de toros y vacas, en donde están obteniendo buenos ingresos, junto a su esposo, ahora desean tener una granja llena y poder vender animales de raza. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “caminando hacia el futuro” y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación  porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Mencia de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más animales para su negocio.
texts.en: In the settlement of Pancan lives Mencia, a serious woman of 34 years that formed her family with Samuel, her husband of 25 years.  The two have 2 small children that they care for in their own house.  Their children still are small,  therefore she wants to consolidate her business and in that way to be able to dedicate more time and offer them a good education.  Along with her husband she divides the daily activities.  She takes care of their sown fields of potatoes and corn, where every morning he plows the pastures and fertilizes them so that they give good fruit.  In spite of the hours of cold and hunger that she passes, she does not feel dismayed, because she knows that every effort always has a reward.  It is so in each crop when they see their effort summarized in the sale of the food to the city.  But some months ago they began the business of buying and selling animals, especially bulls and cows, where they are obtaining a good income.  Along with her husband, they now want to have a full farm and to be able to sell purebreed animals.  She belongs to the supportive group called  "walking toward the future" and this is her fifth loan with MFP.  With its contribution, she hopes to continue with her objectives.  She also promises once more to comply with the payment schedule.   It pleases her to be part of their association because all their members are supportive and responsible people.  To receive their support, Mencia will invest the requested money in the purchase of more animals for her business.

loans.use: to buy more animals

loans.name: Ebtesam

texts.en:
Due to cultural issues, Ebtesam rejected having her picture uploaded on the internet. Thus, the woman in the photo is Ebtesam's sister.

Ebtesam is a 39-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of three children. Ebtesam is requesting a loan of 700 JD to do home maintenance with an aspiration of improving the quality of her family's life.

loans.use: To do home maintenance

loans.name: Alfonsa

texts.es:
Alfonsa es una mujer con mucha paciencia, a sus 64 años, tiene su casa muy acogedora de material noble.  En ella vive con su esposo y sus 05 hijos. Lo que más le gusta hacer a la señora Alfonsa es labrar la tierra para después cultivar plantas de cacao cuya actividad que sabe hacerlo bien. Todos los días de la semana sobre todo por las mañanas después de preparar el desayuno se dirige a sus campos de cultivo.   Lleva aproximadamente 30 años de comercializar los frutos de cacao a los centros de acopio de su localidad de Palmapampa, éste trabajo lo hace con la ayuda de su esposo y de sus hijos quienes se esmeran por salir adelante. Ella se siente contenta con lo que hace, agradece a sus padres por haberle enseñado ya que ahora es su  soporte económico. Por otra parte quiere arreglar la fachada de su vivienda, de esa forma pueda  sentirse mas cómoda. Este será su crédito número 07 con MFP y su deber es seguir siendo  un cliente muy responsable, ya que le gustaría seguir contando con posteriores créditos. Asimismo  se siente muy bien con sus compañeras de crédito al que les tiene mucha estima.
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará materiales como: cemento, pintura, etc. Y así poder arreglar su casa.
texts.en:
Alfonsa is a patient 64-year-old woman with a very cozy home made of good materials. She lives with her husband and their 5 children. Alfonsa most enjoys tilling the soil and growing cocoa plants, which is a business she knows well. Every day of the week, especially in the mornings after preparing breakfast, she goes to the fields. She has around 30 years experience marketing the cocoa fruits to the collection centers in her area of Palmapampa. This work is done with the help of her husband and children, who strive to succeed.  Alfonsa is happy with what she does, and thanks her parents for teaching her the work that provides her financial support. 

Alfonsa wants to fix the front of her house, so that her family can be more comfortable. This will be her 7th loan with MFP and her duty is to continue to be very responsible client, and she would like to continue to take out subsequent loans. She gets on very well with her loan partners and she has a lot of respect for them. 

With the 2,000 soles, Alfonsa will buy materials such as cement, paint, etc so that she can fix her home.

loans.use: to purchase cement and paint to fix the front of her home.

loans.name: Maha

texts.en:
Maha is a 37-year-old Jordanian micro-entrepreneur who is doing embroidery and basketry. She is a married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of five children.

This is the second time Maha is obtaining a loan from Tamweelcom. Her first loan helped her a lot in developing her business and now she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase more raw materials.

Maha is looking to open a shop for her project so that she can increase her income and better improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her business

loans.name: Irene Maria

texts.es: En la actualidad está aplicando a su segundo credikiva, con el que planea responder a sus clientes en la temporada escolar; sus revistas en las campañas traen muy buenos descuentos en cremas y perfumes: tambien tiene encargos de multiusos y uniformes, a los cuales dará respuesta, con esta inversión.  Ella ha logrado aumentar el número de sus clientes y desea ser oportuna con ellos por eso acude a n nuevo credikiva, pues le han encargado productos con los que su inversión será exitosa, porque la hace sobre pedidos, adicionalmente aprovechando los precios especiales con lo que vinieron sus catalogas. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Agradecimientos con su apoyo porque he crecido con mi negocio.”
texts.en:
This applicant, Irene Maria, is currently seeking her second credikiva, with which she plans to respond to her clients orders for the school season. Her catalogue campaigns bring very good discounts on creams and perfumes, and she also has orders for multipurpose products and uniforms, which she will invest in with this loan. 

Irene Maria has managed to increase the number of customers, and as she wants to be timely in serving them she has requested a second loan. The products have been ordered, and her investment will be successful as it is based on existing orders. Additionally, she can take advantage of the special prices offered in her catalogues. 

Her message to the funders of Kiva is: "Thank you for your support because it has allowed me to grow my business."

loans.use: to buy perfumes and creams, linens and fabrics for uniforms and multipurpose products.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 48 años, el se dedica a trabajar diariamente para brindarle lo mejor a su hijo de 16 años, el cual ya está próximo a culminar la etapa escolar. Luis vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad caracterizada por el incremento que se ha realizado en la económica debido a la inauguración de nuevos centros comerciales, los mismos que han permitido mejorar la calidad de vida de las personas y tener conocimiento de otros tipos de ventas, nuevas ideas de negocio y sobre todo el incremento de los puestos de trabajo, lo que genera que esta ciudad este desarrollándose junto a su gente.

Actualmente Luis se dedica a realizar el servicio de transporte público  en una moto taxi propia, trabaja alrededor de  10 horas al día, tiempo en el que aproximadamente solo puede atender a 40 clientes debido a la cantidad de competencia que existe en la ciudad. 

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, Luis podrá realizar algunos trámites que necesita y también cubrirá algunos gastos personales, él en verdad desea mejorar su calidad de vida y continuar ofreciendo su servicio para mejorar continuamente sus ingresos y así poder ofrecerle lo mejor a su pequeño.
texts.en:
Luis is a man of 48. He works every day to offer the best to his son, who is 16 and is close to the culmination of his school years. Luis lives in the city of Ica, a city that is characterized by the economic growth that has materialized thanks to the inauguration of new commercial centers. These have permitted improvements in the quality of life of the people, along with knowledge of other types of sales, new business ideas, and above all the increase in jobs, which cause the city to develop along with its people.

Luis now provides public transportation service in his own moto taxi. He works about 10 hours a day; in this time he can serve approximately 40 customers by himself, due to the quantity of competition that exists in the city.

With the help of the Kiva lenders, Luis will be able to take care of some procedures (paperwork) that he needs to do and also cover some personal expenses. He truly wants to improve his quality of life and continue offering his service in order to continually improve his income and thus offer the best to his young son.

loans.use: to take care of some procedures and some personal expenses

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es: Elvira es una señora bondadosa,  tiene 34 años de edad, vive en su casa con su esposo y sus 04 de hijos, quienes son su alegría. Desde muy pequeña empezó a trabajar en los campos de cultivo y ahora junto a su esposo labran la tierra de su propia chacra donde luego cultivan plantas de café. Ella siempre esta al tanto de su siembra que con tanto esmero logró conseguir. En tiempos de cosecha, cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros porque de esa forma llegan a extraer rápido sus frutos. Después hace su secado de los granos de café para que pueda llevar a vender a las sociedades acopiadoras de su localidad; donde recibe buenas ganancias por cada Kilo de de su producto. Mas adelante desea comprar un terreno para sembrar mas plantas de café que le ayudan en los gastos económicos de su hogar. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP y asegura que pagara todas sus cuotas En su grupo trabaja con personas responsables y sobre todo solidarias. Con los 500 nuevos soles, comprará fertilizantes agroquímicos para mantener fértiles sus plantas.
texts.en:
This member, Elvira, is a gracious lady who is 34 years old and lives at home with her ​​husband and four children, who are her joy. From an early age she began working in the fields ,and now she works with her husband tilling the soil of their own farm where they grown coffee plants. 

She is always very aware of and careful with her crops so she has managed to succeed. At harvest time, she needs the support of laborers because she needs to be able to extract the fruits quickly. After drying the coffee beans, she is able it to sell to members of their local societies, where she gains good earnings per kilo of her product. 

In future, Elvira wants to buy land to plant more coffee plants, which will help with the household costs. This will be her third credit with MFP, and she will ensure that she pays all of her dues. In their group, she works with responsible people responsible and above all there is group solidarity. 

With 500 soles, Elvira will buy fertilizer chemicals to keep her plants fertile.

loans.use: buy fertilizer chemicals to keep her plants fertile.

loans.name: Pompeyo Esau

texts.es:
El joven Pompeyo Esau es soltero tiene 24 años de edad, cursa el tercer años de educación básico, su profesión es ser piloto de camiones, tiene este trabajo gracias al apoyo de su señor padre y tiene 3 años de experiencia en ser piloto.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para pagar sus estudios de diversificado, ya que va ha llevar su carrera en nivel medio y mejorar su condición de vida y la de su familia, en el futuro espera contar con su propio camión y su propio negocio de trasporte.
texts.en:
Young Pompeyo Esau is 24 years old and single. He is in his third year of basic education, and he works as a truck driver. He works with the support of his father, and has three years experience.

Pompeyo has applied for a loan which he will use to pay for his higher studies, which will give him a mid-level career and improve living conditions for himself and his family. In the future he hopes to have his own truck and his own transport business.

loans.use: to pay for his education expenses

loans.name: Andong 5 Group

texts.en: Marini is 33 years old and married with two children who are six and four years old. One of the children is attending school. She is a hardworking and caring mother. She and her husband, who works as an employee, help each other to provide their family needs and ensure that the family lives in suitable conditions. For the past 15 years, she has been running a small sewing business in her house. Her business is going well but she can only receive a limited number of orders and she needs more money to buy yarn, fabric and needles. That’s why she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner VisionFund Indonesia. In the future, she wants to have her own boutique kiosk and send her children to a better education. The other group members will use their loans to improve their businesses such as a general store, selling fried food and a beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy yarn, fabric and needles

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to add to her inventory and buy more soft drinks such as pop ice to sell

loans.name: Al-Entsar Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Entsar. It consists of four members who are all females Matrah, Entsar, Najat and Obadiah. All of them are friends and from Hodeidah, Yemen. They have primarily worked together in a small business selling incenses, perfumes and pigment for several years. The entire group took a loan of 150,000 YER.

Matrah is a 51-year-old married lady who lives in Hodeidah, Yemen (she is placed in the middle of the photo with her face uncovered). She sells incenses, perfumes and pigment at low rates to clients in her community.

Her husband is unemployed and they have difficult living conditions. Therefore, she is responsible for the durable household expenses and her income was not enough for the whole family, which is why she started her business. Matrah has developed a good reputation in her community for her customer dealings and good quality services. She is very experienced in her business and has been operating it for more than 10 years. 

Matrah has applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB for her business. With this loan, she will purchase cosmetics, incense and perfumes, which will allow her to fulfill her client orders on time and earn higher profits. She is confident of her business' success after investing the loan.

In the future, she hopes to have a cosmetics shop in order to increase her profit income.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics, incense and perfumes

loans.name: Kennedy

texts.en:
Kennedy is a thirty-two-year-old man from Kakamega town, West Kenya and is married to Sarah. They have two children aged three years and eight months.

Kennedy operates a footwear shop, a business he has done for the last eight years, making a monthly income of KES. 24,000. He has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD which he will use to buy a stock of sandals and shoes.  He will use his profits to repay the loan and also start a business for his wife.

His dream is to educate his children through his business.

loans.use: To buy a stock of footwear like sandals and shoes.

loans.name: Rosaura

texts.es:
Rosaura, de 65 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora, empeñosa y con muchas ganas de progresar. Está casada con Eliasar, quien por ahora está desempleado. Tiene una hija que a la vez es madre de un niño. Y juntos habitan en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Rosaura es la venta de comida, como: juanes, tamales y pollos fritos, negocio que lo realiza por la noche, en la que instalao una mesa en el frontis de su casa desde donde atiende muy amablemente a todos sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus vecinos. Éste negocio lo tiene desde hace 03 años, y cuenta con el apoyo de su hija en la labores de preparación y venta de comida.
Le gusta su negocio pues gracias a ello ha logrado salir de muchas dificultades económicas, además de poder estar en la comodidad de su casa, sin tener que realizar muchas gastos. Por otro lado no le agrada cuando llueve mucho pues dificulta las ventas por el hecho de estar ubicada en la vereda. Por otro lado le ha dado buenos resultados, por tanto tiene planes de abrir un restaurante en su casa, habilitando un espacio para brindar una mejor comodidad a sus clientes. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado comenta estar conforme con el trabajado que viene realizando en su banco comunal por el apoyo que brindan a las personas.
Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de ingredientes para la preparación de los alimentos como arroz, azúcar, aceites y otros.
texts.en:
Rosaura is 65 years old. She is a hard-working woman who is dedicated and has a great desire to get ahead. She is married to Eliasar, who is currently unemployed. She has one daughter, who in turn is the mother of a son. Together they live in their own home. Rosaura's business is selling food, such as juanes [chicken and rice wrapped in bijao leaves], tamales and fried chicken. She operates this business in the evenings, setting up a table in front of her house, where she serves all of her customers, who are mainly her neighbors, in a very friendly manner. She has run this business for 3 years, and she has her daughter's help with the work of preparing and selling the food. 

She likes her business, since thanks to it she has been able to escape from many economic hardships. In addition, she can stay in the comfort of her home without paying a lot of expenses. On the other side, she is unhappy when it rains a lot, because sales become very difficult since her stand is on the sidewalk. Still, she has achieved good results, and because of this she plans to open a restaurant in her home, setting up a space to provide greater comfort to her customers. This will be her second loan with the MFP institution, and she hopes for a small loan so that she can achieve her goals. At the same time, she comments that she likes the work her communal bank is doing, because of the support it provides to the people. 

With the amount she is requesting, 800 Peruvian new soles, she will invest in buying ingredients to prepare her foods, such as rice, sugar, cooking oil and others.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil and meat.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Hana'a

texts.en:
Hana'a is 43 years old and married. She is from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of six children.

Hana'a is requesting a loan of 1,000 JD to pay her daughter's university fees.

Hana'a is looking to improve her family life conditions and help all her children to continue their higher education.

loans.use: to finance her daughter education fees

loans.name: Najat

texts.en: Najat is a 53-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and the mother of six children. Najat is requesting a loan of 500 Jordanian dinars to do home maintenance, aspiring to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to do home maintenance

loans.name: Fawzwyeh

texts.en: Fawzwyeh is a 59-year-old woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan. She sells clothes from her home. She is requesting a loan of 1,200 Jordanian dinars to purchase clothes for trading purposes. Fawzwyeh is looking to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for trading purposes

loans.name: Jardines De La Luz Group

texts.es:
La socia Ana Paula; es  soltera  y tiene 19 años de edad; la socia  a tomado por traspazo de un local snak y cafetin ubicado en el mismo cementerio; la socia tiene muchos deseos de crecer y seguir prosperando y para esto ella se esta esforzando mucho para que le vaya muy bien en los negocios y asi poder estudiar con lo que le genere la venta de sus productos y de su cafetin; la socia en esta ocasión desea invertir en la compra de productos como gaseosas, jugos de frutas, bocaditos, sandwich, azúcar, golosinas, galletas entre otros. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de productos para implementar su cafetin snack.
La socia se encuentra situada en la parte superior a un costado de la fotografia porque no habia luz en el mismo local razon por la que tuvimos que salir a la avenida principal. 

Los otros socios siguen con su negocio de floreria y los demas con su labor de panteoneros.
texts.en:
Communal bank member Ana Paula is single and is 19 years old. Through a transfer, she has taken over a snack stand and cafe located in the same cemetery. She has a great desire to grow and continue prospering, and for this she is making a great effort so that she does well in her businesses, and thus she is studying what products in her stand and cafe generate sales. At this time she wants to invest in the purchase of products such as soft drinks, fruit juices, snacks, sandwiches, sugar, candies, and crackers, among other items. She is applying for the loan to invest in the purchase of products to set up her cafe and stand.

In the photograph, she is in the upper part at one side because there was no light on the same premises, so we had to go out to the main street.

The other members continue with their work as cemetery workers and one with a florist business.

loans.use: to purchase products to set up her cafe and snack stand

loans.name: Ekram

texts.en:
Ekram is a 53-year-old married woman from Al Hasmi, Amman, Jordan and she has three children.

Ekram is requesting a loan of 400 JD to do home maintenance with an aspiration of improving her family's living conditions. She is looking to purchase a house for the family instead of their rented one.

loans.use: to do home maintenance

loans.name: Majeda

texts.en: Mejeda is a 58-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of four children. Mejeda is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do home maintenance with an aspiration of improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to do home maintenance

loans.name: Kholnazar

texts.ru: Холназар трудолюбивый и умный человек. Он любящий отец 3-х сыновей и 3-их дочерей. Жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Более 8 лет Холназар занимается выращиванием кукурузы, пшеницы и овса, имеет небольшой сад для выращивания сельхозпродуктов.  В бизнесе помогают сыновья, жена и дочь. Холназар запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Kholnazar is a hardworking and intelligent person. He is a loving father of three sons and three daughters. His wife works on a private (dekhan) farm. For more the eight years, Kholnazar has been growing corn, wheat, and oats, and has a small garden for growing produce. His sons, wife, and daughters help out with the business. Kholnazar is asking for a loan of 3000 Somoni to purchase mineral fertilzer.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Sandy

texts.es: Sandy es un joven muy activo, tiene 29 años de edad, convive con su joven pareja, tiene 01 hija, viven en su propia casa que hace poco lograron comprar. Sandy es un joven laborioso, vende helado por mas de 15 años en la localidad de Palmapampa, para  iniciar este negocio tuvo que trabajar para una heladería, ahora con sus ahorros tiene su propia tienda de helados donde muchos de sus pobladores acuden a su puesto de venta, generando celo para la heladería donde trabajaba, pero tuvo mucha perseverancia para no incomodar, gracias a la buena atención y amabilidad que ofrece hoy ah ganado la confianza y estima de sus consumidores. Sin embargo considera difícil en los tiempos de lluvia ya que genera poca ganancia. De hecho lo mas desea es ampliar su negocio y hacer de ella una empresa para después poder dar trabajo a la gente que necesita como un día empezó Sandy. Este será su crédito número 06 con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con su cronograma de pagos, además tiene un buen concepto de su grupo comunal, por el apoyo incondicional que lo otorga. Con el crédito solicitado, realizará los gastos de su hogar comprando insumos de alimento para su familia.
texts.en:
29-year-old Sandy is a very active young man who lives with his young partner. They have one daughter, and live in their own home which they recently managed to buy. 

Sandy is hardworking, and has been selling ice cream for over 15 years in the town of Palmapampa. To start this business he had to work for an ice cream parlor, but with his savings he now has his own ice cream store where he has many customers. This generated jealousy from the ice cream shop where he used to work, but with a lot of perseverance he did not let it affect him. Thanks to the good service and kindness he offered, he has won the confidence and esteem of his customers. However, he has difficulty in wet weather because it generates little profit. 

What Sandy wants most is to expand his business and turn it into a company that can create jobs for people who need it, as Sandy once did. This will be Sandy's 6th loan with MFP, and he is committed to continue to fulfill his payment schedule. He also has a good relationship with his community group, and is grateful for the unconditional support they provide. 

With the requested loan, he will pay the household costs and purchase food supplies for his family.

loans.use: to purchase food supplies for his family

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en: Zeinab is 48 years old and married. She is from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of three children. Zeinab is looking to improve her family's living conditions. Thus, she is requesting a loan of 900 JD to do maintenance for her home .

loans.use: to do home maintenance

loans.name: Husein

texts.en:
Husein is a 31-year-old married man, father of four children.
He has been working in car body repair for 16 years, a long enough experience to attract loyal customers & to expand his business.
Husein is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to buy tools necessary for his business. In addition, he will do needed improvements for his work space such as adding an extra metal roof top to use as an attic and fixing his floor tiles.
Husein is a hardworking man, who seeks perfection in his business. That's why he needs this loan to renovate everything around him.
